basics.name: Anlon Mao
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I'm a Computer Science undergraduate at UH Mānoa currently on an accelerated academic path. By Fall 2025, I plan to apply to both the BAM (B.S./M.S.) program and the Korean Flagship Program. I'm on track to complete my B.S. by Spring 2027, and aim to earn a B.A. in Korean for Professionals and an M.S. in Computer Science by 2028.

work.summary: Assist with kitchen operations and sanitation at a high-volume café.
highlights: Maintain a clean and efficient dishwashing station during peak hours
Support kitchen prep work and adhere to food safety procedures
Collaborate with staff to ensure timely service and kitchen flow

volunteer.summary: A passionate group dedicated to designing, building, and showcasing video games using Unity and various other tools.
highlights: Interacted and collaborated with group members to develop systems for video games

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: Deans List
awards.summary: Recognized for academic excellence for both Fall 2024 and Spring 2025 semesters (freshman year).
